===OCTAVE_MYTHOLOGY_PRIMER===
META:
  TYPE::PRIMER
  VERSION::"6.0.0"
  TOKENS::~45
  TIER::ULTRA

§1::ESSENCE
PURPOSE::"Map concepts→mythological"
OCTAVE::"Semantic DSL for LLMs"
METHOD::concepts→ATOMS[mythology]

§2::MAP
EXECUTIVE→ZEUS
STRUCTURE→ATLAS
MESSENGER→HERMES
GUARDIAN→ATHENA
CREATOR→PROMETHEUS

§3::SYNTAX
ATOM[role]::archetype
⊕::unify_atoms
⇌::opposing_forces
→::becomes

§4::ONE_SHOT
IN::"Leader who builds systems"
OUT::ZEUS⊕ATLAS[executive_architect]

§5::VALIDATE
MUST::[valid_OCTAVE,preserve_§_names_verbatim,archetype_fits,atoms_combined,semantic_preserved]
===END===
